With a discourse of kingdoms, republiques, & states-popular. As also, of kings and princes: to which is annexed, the new models of modern policy. / By J.G. Gent.

titleStmt.author: Goślicki, Wawrzyniec, 1530-1607.

notesStmt.note: A translation of "De optimo senatore" by Wawrzyniec Goślicki, with "The new models of modern policy" by J.G., i.e. John Grimefield?, annexed.

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
